com.epoch.db
Class HWStore

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.db.DBTables
      com.epoch.db.HWStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
HWSetConstants, StaticLimits, EvalResultConstants, QuestionConstants, XMLConstants
public final class HWStore
extends DBTables
implements EvalResultConstants, HWSetConstants, QuestionConstants

Sets, retrieves assignments during assembly or for homework session.

                               throws DBException,
                                      NonExistentException
For homework session; get the list of questions for this assignment.

Parameters:
hwId - assignment ID number
userId - login (UK) or SMS (Pearson) ID
languages - languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only
isStudent - true if this request is for a student's assignment
Returns:
array of questions
Throws:
DBException
NonExistentException

getQuestions

public static Question[] getQuestions(int hwId,
                                      String userId,
                                      String qNumStr,
                                      String[] languages)
                               throws DBException,
                                      NonExistentException
For gradebook session (show response) via homework session; get one particular question in this assignment.

Parameters:
hwId - assignment ID number
userId - login (UK) or SMS (Pearson) ID
qNumStr - null if should load all questions in this assignment, or serial number of single question to load
languages - languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only
Returns:
array of questions
Throws:
DBException
NonExistentException

getQuestions

public static Question[] getQuestions(int hwId,
                                      String userId,
                                      String qNumStr,
                                      String[] languages,
                                      boolean isStudent,
                                      boolean fullLoad)
                               throws DBException,
                                      NonExistentException
For homework or gradebook session; get all questions or one particular question in this assignment.

Parameters:
hwId - assignment ID number
userId - login (UK) or SMS (Pearson) ID
qNumStr - null if should load all questions in this assignment, or serial number of single question to load
languages - languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only
isStudent - true if this request is for a student's assignment
fullLoad - true if the entire question should be loaded; otherwise, only flags and question data are loaded
Returns:
array of questions
Throws:
DBException
NonExistentException
